CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 23, 1951, pg. 1, reads: "Big Hearts Aid Little Heart - Four-year-old George Payne, son of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Lee Payne, 38-F Midway Drive, Whitaker, won the hearts of the doctors and nurses at Children's Hospital. Thanks to the Heart Association of Pittsburgh, he is being flown to Hahnemann Hospital in Philadelphia in a plane with pressurized cabin and oxygen facilities. He needed oxygen on his way to and from the airports. There is a slender hope that he might live if he can get the proper treatment, which includes rare surgery. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Three men and two women, including nurse, gathered around George Payne seated in wheelchair with oxygen tank, outdoors
